question: Which Indian is selected for the 2020 Asia Game Changer Award of the Asia Society?
explanation:
Star Chef of India, Vikas Khanna will be honoured with the prestigious 2020 Asia Game Changer, presented by the Asia Society.
It is a US-based non-profit organisation that honours the people, who make a positive contribution to the future of Asia. Vikas Khanna has been selected for arranging ‘#FeedIndia initiative’ a food distribution drive that helped millions of people across India, during the COVID-19 pandemic.
